block.p: ORIN--Gloria. On April 5, 2007. Beloved wife of Richard. Adored mother of Dr. Gary Orin and Rhonda Orin Eisenstein and their spouses, Sheila Orin and Harry Eisenstein. Cherished grandmother of Melanie, Eric, Lana, Fara, Ethan and Matthew. Devoted daughter of the late Joseph and Mae Klein. Dear sister of the late Irwin (Buddy). Services Sunday 12:45 pm at ''The Riverside'' 76th Street and Amsterdam Avenue.
